Zigzag Timeline Component Showcase

Default Zigzag Timeline

Interactive timeline with 5 steps. Drag the indicator to move along the timeline.

Current position: 0 / 5

Custom Colored Timeline

Timeline with custom colors for the line and indicator.

Timeline with Custom Labels

Timeline with custom labels for the start, current, and end positions.

Non-Interactive Timeline

This timeline is set to be non-interactive and cannot be manipulated by the user.

Timeline with Many Steps

A timeline with 8 steps to show how the component handles more complex zigzag patterns.
